roleset.name: select a portion of a larger whole
roleset.note: SAMPLE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on sample-v.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from sample.01-n)
SAMPLED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from sampled.01-j)

roles.note: Arg2 added based on corpus examples. Be very careful here-- the line between eventive and physically concrete examples can be fuzzy and hard to see sometime, but try to avoid non-eventive instances! (from sample.01-n)

role.descr: source of the samples (if in addition to arg1)

example.name: active
example.text: He said 30% of the loans [0]-1 he sampled *trace*-1 were ``dead meat on the day they were made.''

example.name: passive
example.text: Both reports are based on [several thousand patients]-1 sampled *trace*-1 in a 1985 nationwide government survey.

example.name: light verb
example.text: We took a sample of the total population.
Uh their urine sample is going to come out positive because there will be strong metabolytes /.

example.name: Both args
example.text: In Figueroa's sampling of the waters of Galapagos, he has also discovered a number of species that seem to be previously unreported.
